statements: SELECT * FROM robot_performance_data WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM robot_performance_data WHERE recorded_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_data WHERE performance_value > 1000;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, recorded_date FROM robot_performance_data WHERE performance_value < 500 AND recorded_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT performance_metric, performance_value FROM robot_performance_data WHERE recorded_date = '2022-02-10';
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_data ORDER BY recorded_date DESC, performance_metric ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM robot_performance_data WHERE performance_metric = 'speed' ORDER BY performance_value DESC;
SELECT robot_id, AVG(performance_value) AS avg_value FROM robot_performance_data GROUP BY robot_id HAVING avg_value > 50;
SELECT performance_metric, COUNT(*) AS metric_count FROM robot_performance_data GROUP BY performance_metric ORDER BY metric_count DESC;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM robot_performance_data WHERE recorded_date >= '2022-01-01' AND recorded_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metrics -> 'battery_level' AS battery_level FROM robot_performance_data WHERE robot_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM robot_errors WHERE robot_id = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222' ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_id, performance_metrics -> 'speed' AS speed, performance_metrics -> 'distance_traveled' AS distance_traveled FROM robot_performance_data ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM robot_performance_data WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week'
SELECT robot_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(performance_metrics->'task_completion_time') AS task_time FROM robot_performance_data WHERE task_time > '00:30:00'
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM robot_errors GROUP BY robot_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT robot_id, error_message, error_timestamp FROM robot_errors ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC
SELECT robot_id, JSONB_OBJECT_KEYS(performance_metrics) AS metrics_keys FROM robot_performance_data WHERE metrics_keys LIKE 'battery%'
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformance;
SELECT performance_date, performance_metric FROM RobotPerformance ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM RobotMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair';
SELECT robot_id, location_name, ST_ASTEXT(location_coordinates) FROM RobotLocation WHERE location_name LIKE 'Distribution%' ORDER BY location_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, performance_date, performance_metric FROM RobotPerformance WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformance WHERE performance_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, AVG(performance_metric) AS avg_performance FROM RobotPerformance GROUP BY robot_id HAVING avg_performance > 0.6;
SELECT r.robot_id, r.performance_metric, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM RobotPerformance r INNER JOIN RobotMaintenance m ON r.robot_id = m.robot_id WHERE r.performance_metric > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocation WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location_coordinates, 'POINT(10 20)') < 5;
SELECT r.robot_id, r.performance_metric, l.location_name FROM RobotPerformance r INNER JOIN RobotLocation l ON r.robot_id = l.robot_id WHERE l.location_name LIKE '%factory%';
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformanceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM RobotPerformanceData WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, launch_date FROM RobotModels WHERE production_status = TRUE;
SELECT error_id, robot_id, error_message FROM RobotErrors ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT maintenance_id, robot_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_timestamp FROM RobotMaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformanceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT performance_metric, performance_value FROM RobotPerformanceData WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, launch_date FROM RobotModels WHERE production_status = TRUE;
SELECT robot_id, error_message, error_timestamp FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_timestamp FROM RobotMaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformanceData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM RobotPerformanceData WHERE performance_metric = 'Speed' ORDER BY performance_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM RobotMaintenanceLog ORDER BY maintenance_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, error_type, error_code, error_timestamp FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_timestamp >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_id, robot_id, task_description, task_status FROM RobotTasks ORDER BY task_due_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RobotPerformanceData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC, robot_id
SELECT performance_metric, AVG(performance_value) FROM RobotPerformanceData GROUP BY performance_metric HAVING AVG(performance_value) > 50
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_type = 'Critical' GROUP BY robot_id ORDER BY total_errors DESC
SELECT robot_id, task_description FROM RobotTasks WHERE task_status = 'Incomplete' AND task_due_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT robot_id, MAX(calibration_value) AS max_calibration_value FROM RobotCalibrationData GROUP BY robot_id HAVING MAX(calibration_value) > 100
